title: FeatBit
content: The Advantage development sub-team on the Linear Tools team utilizes FeatBit’s open source solution for feature flag management. If you need access to this application, please submit an Okta Access Request (or type /access FeatBit in a Slack message box). Once you submit your request, you will be automatically added to a group that allows you to login via a FeatBit tile. However, please note that the Digital Workplace team will provision your user first before that tile will function for Okta SSO login. Once the Digital Workplace team has provisioned your user in FeatBit, you can log in by using the following instructions: Instructions Log into your Okta portal if you have not already done so for the day. Select the FeatBit tile in your portal. You will be redirected to the FeatBit login page. It will take a beat and then log you into the platform. [NOTE] The first time you log into it through Okta, if it doesn’t pass through for whatever reason, you can: Select SSO on the FeatBit login page . Use the workspace key: simplifi .
